documents.document: I move away from England for 5 months and everything's gone to absolute shite, never coming back https://t.co/AXdEA0Yvma
Another game I'll never forget, can't believe it #WatfordFC
Let's not forget these timeless classics https://t.co/mcwXaHNYd7
I was at these games, nothing like watching #WatfordFC bottle it in the last few minutes https://t.co/bEwuMfyYhe
@JoeClowsley Yep, think I'm going to get a car too, can't be dealing with a 4 hour bus journey after a 0-0 with West Brom ever again
@JoeClowsley disgrace, glad I'm missing this shit show. Need to avoid relegation, start fresh in August. This season is a write off
@JoeClowsley Didn't think it could get worse than that Gillingham result...
@LukeBradley_95 Nah mate that never happened
@LukeBradley_95 @JoeClowsley I want you to be ready with a camera for when the inevitable tears start when Palace get relegated
Best thing I've seen all year https://t.co/I5ZEhNTmWK
Depay was a bit shit wasn't he? A poor man's Amrabat
Millwall away in the FA Cup @JoeClowsley let me book my flights
Canada just lost to the USA in the juniors, whatever that is. All I know is they were 4-2 up and bottled it, a disgrace to the country
All my mates at home are watching football together whilst I'm 8 hours behind stuck in a lecture 😴 Time difference is shit
Giroud 👏👏 Goal of the season for sure
@bowtrain ooh fancy
@bowtrain absolutely true, nothing I'd love more than to be browsing the superb selection of shops at the Galleria right now
I'm genuinely the luckiest person I know, how did I even end up in Canada?😐 I got CDE in my A Levels, got rejected from every uni I applied@
Few weeks ago I was in a drive thru and the stranger in the car in front of me paid for my order 😍 Forgot to say thanks, whoever you are
There's a girl on my floor who genuinely tried to convince me that your head is heavier than the rest of your body 😐
Later on & I finally get given the responsibility to deliver a pizza all by myself and my car breaks down in an intersection 😢
1st day at Domino's: Guy who's driving me around causes a car crash, spent an hour sitting at the side of the road with crying victims
@Luke_Sprague RIP a fallen brother
My car broke down 30 minutes before my first shift as a pizza delivery driver, why me
Bad things happen when Watford lose https://t.co/m9sCArD4RM
@jbnadin1 Got a better chance of big Younes coming on and scoring a 40 yard scorpion kick
@jbnadin1 last time we dropped Deeney we got absolutely shat on by Spurs, gonna be a field trip for Nolito
@jbnadin1 He has to be on the pitch to score..
@jbnadin1 7-0 City heard it here first
Finished my first semester in Canada, mad
@JoeClowsley Nah, probably not back till August. Watford v Palace on boxing day at 4:30am here, it's the only thing I have planned over xmas
My uni in England want me to get a minimum of 9, preferably 12 credits from each semester. I'm currently on course to get 3 #believe
Imagine conceding 5 goals to Bob Bradley's Swansea. He's a poor man's Henning Berg
I know a guy who's dog got swooped up and eaten by an owl. Canada is nuts
Lived in Canada for over a month now, mad
Never cringed so hard in my life, going to be having nightmares for weeks about tonight
Been to 1 lecture in Canada and I've already dropped a module #WorthThe16HourJourney
@jbnadin1 Following the footsteps my dad, pretty sure he's a legend in those parts
@jbnadin1 😂 from my experiences about 90% of the people who put shit in those groups are total drips, what uni you going to?
Can't wait to win the PL https://t.co/dsYYxzW7NA
@WatfordBabble I travel from Surrey, takes me 2 hours each way. Made it home by 1am to watch Nyom, Paredes & Anya fail to cross a ball
Thanks for that @WatfordFC
@FootyFansChants @JoeClowsley love the MLS already
Off to my final PL game at Vicarage road before Canada, can't wait for my 4 hour round trip to end in a 0-0
@jeaton__ @WatfordFCBlog Nyom has been shite for ages..wasn't at the game today but sounded like more of the same. Why is he still with us?
@WatfordFC It's 12:01 and I still can't buy them. Disappointing
Filling out a "Lifestyle Questionnaire" for my accommodation in Canada, what even is this? https://t.co/DCJidWMT83
A pilot at work filed an official complaint about me because I called him "mate" rather than "sir" or "captain" ☺☺☺
@LukeBradley_95 Remembering this tweet for when he scores a hatrick against Palace
Isaac Success signs for Watford for approximately £12.5m, double our previous transfer record. Remember the name.
@Edris_Delveccio Why not try Coventry? I heard it's live
@IfraAshraf @JoeClowsley What size are you mate?
@LukeBradley_95 @JoeClowsley Absolute bottlejob Bradley senior. Not as bad as when you bottled it for the Millwall pitch invasion ey? 😉
@LukeBradley_95 @JoeClowsley Leave it out Bradley, just been on the phone to your dad & he's in the room next to me. I'll have words
@WatfordTweet Will take a minimum of 2 years to leave the EU anyway, so shouldn't change much if anything
@WatfordTweet I read somewhere a month or two ago he had already failed to get a work permit? Not sure if there's any substance behind that
Sums it up perfectly https://t.co/DwFMXLL5pX
@Anscommmmb Ahaha i'm just enjoying all this while it lasts. Too many 17 year old hair & beauty students have been believing Facebook memes
@Anscommmmb What's logical about having unelected officials making a good portion of our laws?
Nobody can say this has been a good or bad decision yet, it's been 12 hrs since voting stopped ffs 😂 Give it time & then do your complaining
@JoeClowsley Just like when Palace won the semi finals but bottled it against 10 men United @LukeBradley_95
@JoeClowsley Haha no i'm not, I didn't even vote for the Tories. My point was people get loud on the day then forget about it quickly
People banging on about young people getting fucked over by old people like they're more important. We're equal no matter your age, surely?
@danielstorey85 We never elect Prime Ministers you mug
@MattNadin @alexdoesporn Give this a watch if you can be arsed, I thought it was good
@alexdoesporn @BBCNews https://t.co/8Jv8aiXiR2 Not that this example effect my vote, it was just the first example I could give
@alexdoesporn So much can happen in the next 20/50/99 years, which nobody knows. Leaving the EU doesn't change our uncertainty of the future
@alexdoesporn EU Army, perhaps? https://t.co/91O0isQsfH Not so much anything in particular anyway, just the principle. They're unaccountable
@alexdoesporn I am not certain what these unaccountable bureaucrats could have done, but now we don't need to worry?
@alexdoesporn Why? I see it the opposite. We couldn't remove the EU officials who make a good portion of our laws, but now they're gone
Hearing now our future is uncertain. It's the future, it's ALWAYS uncertain. Leaving the EU doesn't change that unless they can time travel
@alexdoesporn Ask @Nigel_Farage He probably knows more
@alexdoesporn ...that leaving the EU will stop you from working abroad in Europe. Might make it a bit more hassle though
@alexdoesporn Honestly no idea mate, probably means you'll have to fill out more paperwork & shit? I doubt...
@alexdoesporn We were never in the Schengen zone, you've always needed a passport to leave the UK, so there's no difference in movement
There's been such a meltdown from so many 'Remain' supporters, where's ArsenalFanTV when you need them?
Wouldn't be surprised if half of these pro-EU tweets will be the same
When the Conservatives won the 2015 election, out came a flurry of "well, England's down the toilet for the next 5 yrs" Heard nothing since
Democracy has won. Hoping that in 40 years time we'll look back at this decision and say we made the right choice
@James__Pereira @Luke_Sprague Sprague you have a little bit of sandwich with your mayonnaise not the other way around

@JoeClowsley Also this is a short sighted view as people have pointed out. The idea of Brexit is for the long term, not the next 5/10 years
@JoeClowsley This guy has just said that a left-led Labour party WITH the Greens would help Britain. I want whatever he's smoking
If he goes for £30M or more we'll still get relegated. Remember this tweet https://t.co/7T4S3alrzh
We're almost definitely going to remain in the EU anyway but thought I'd share my view just in case it fucks us up 20 years down the line
